mapper.select: SELECT city_id, name, spell, code number, structure_id, structure_title, enable, enable_false_time, briefSpell, is_open_delivery FROM city WHERE code = #{cityNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO city (NAME, SPELL, CODE, STRUCTURE_ID, STRUCTURE_TITLE, ENABLE, ENABLE_FALSE_TIME) VALUES (#{name}, #{spell}, #{number}, #{structureId}, #{structureTitle}, #{enable}, #{enableFalseTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE city_inventory SET available_ity = available_ity + #{qty} WHERE gid = #{gid} AND city_id = (SELECT cus_customer.city_id FROM cus_customer WHERE cus_id = #{userId})
UPDATE city_inventory SET available_ity = available_ity + #{qty} WHERE gid = #{gid} AND city_id = (SELECT emp_employee.city_id FROM emp_employee WHERE emp_id = #{userId})

UPDATE city
NAME = #{name},
SPELL = #{spell},
STRUCTURE_ID = #{structureId},
STRUCTURE_TITLE = #{structureTitle},
ENABLE = #{enable},
ENABLE_FALSE_TIME = #{enableFalseTime},
WHERE CODE = #{number}
